name: jsonm
description: Memoization and string interning for reducing bandwidth usage of your JSON-based messages!

scripts.browserify: mkdir -p out; node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js lib/jsonm/packer.js -o out/packer.js && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js lib/jsonm/unpacker.js -o out/unpacker.js && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js jsonm.js -o out/jsonm.js

author: Lennart Kats <lennart add c9.io>
